MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL72 postcode area of Moelfre, affecting properties in Moelfre and surrounding area. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  6.06PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7.42PM on 19th March 2021
